statements: SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_consent WHERE consent_given = true;
SELECT * FROM user_consent WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, consent_date FROM user_consent WHERE consent_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT email, name FROM user_consent WHERE consent_given = false ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_consent WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY consent_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_consent ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT name, email, consent_given FROM user_consent WHERE consent_given = true
SELECT * FROM user_consent WHERE consent_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY consent_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, email FROM user_consent ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM user_consent WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM user_consent;
SELECT user_id, consent_given FROM user_consent WHERE data_processing_allowed = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, consent_given, data_processing_allowed FROM user_consent WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, data_sharing_allowed FROM user_consent ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, consent_given, data_sharing_allowed FROM user_consent WHERE consent_given = TRUE ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_consent WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

SELECT * FROM user_consent WHERE data_sharing_allowed = FALSE AND data_processing_allowed = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, consent_given, data_processing_allowed FROM user_consent ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS count FROM user_consent;
SELECT * FROM user_consent;
SELECT user_id, consent_date, data_processing_consent FROM user_consent WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, consent_date, data_processing_consent FROM user_consent ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, consent_date, data_processing_consent FROM user_consent WHERE data_processing_consent = TRUE;

SELECT user_id, consent_date FROM user_consent WHERE data_processing_consent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_consent WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_consents FROM user_consent GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_consents > 1;
SELECT user_id, consent_date, regulation_name FROM user_consent CROSS JOIN privacy_regulations WHERE data_sharing_consent = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, action_date, regulation_name FROM consent_history INNER JOIN privacy_regulations ON consent_history.record_id = privacy_regulations.regulation_id ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, consent_given FROM user_permissions ORDER BY consent_last_updated DESC;
SELECT data_id, user_id, data_type FROM data_collection WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT shared_with, data_id FROM data_sharing WHERE sharing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, regulation_description FROM privacy_regulations;

SELECT user_id, consent_given FROM user_permissions WHERE consent_given = TRUE ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT data_id, data_type, data_collected_date FROM data_collection WHERE data_type = 'personal' ORDER BY data_collected_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM data_sharing WHERE sharing_date >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND sharing_date <= '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM privacy_regulations ORDER BY regulation_id;
SELECT * FROM user_consent;
SELECT user_id, consent_option, consent_date FROM user_consent ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, consent_option FROM user_consent WHERE consent_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM data_processing WHERE process_status = FALSE ORDER BY process_id;
SELECT process_name, process_description FROM data_processing WHERE process_category = 'Data Processing';
